name: Thermal elastohydrodynamic program
tagline: Numerical program solving Reynolds equation with the FDM based on P. Huangs work.
body:
### Welcome to GitHub Pages.
This cod is under construction. It has been used for the two following articles published in Tribology International: 
* Contact fatigue initiation and tensile surface stresses at a point asperity which passes an elastohydrodynamic contact, 2018
* Surface initiation of rolling contact fatigue at asperities considering slip, shear limit and thermal elastohydrodynamic lubrication, 2019
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
